page.title: 19ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: IN THE{BRUNTON}AREA SOME PEOPLE SELL THEIR{ARTS AND CRAFT.OTHERS }MAKE THINGS JUST FOR PLEASURE. THEY DO LOTS OF DIFFERENT{ARTS AND CRAFTS,}FOR EXAMPLE{KNITTING,CROCHETING,NEEDLE {WORK, PHOTOGRAPHY,PETIT POINT}AND{ {FLOWER ARRANGING.}THE MOST UNUSUAL ONE WE FOUND WAS{CROOK MAKING.}HE USED YOUNG TREES,SHEEP'S HORNS. THE PEOPLE WHO DO{ARTS AND CRAFTS}USE THE OBJECTS THEY MAKE TO FURNISH THEIR HOUSES AND FOR ENTERING LOCAL SHOWS.MOST OF THE LADIES WHO DO NEEDLE WORK OR KNITTING BELONG TO THE{WOMEN'S GUILD}OR THE {SWRI.}SOME GIVE DEMONSTRATIONS OF THEIR {ART AND CRAFT.}
